parameters.name: Small
parameters.description: Small image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

parameters.name: Medium
parameters.description: Medium image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

parameters.name: Large
parameters.description: Large image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

title: ISldWorks.GetImageSize
signature:
System.Int32 GetImageSize( 
   out System.Int32
Small
,
   out System.Int32
Medium
,
   out System.Int32
Large
)

parameters.name: Small
parameters.description: Small image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

parameters.name: Medium
parameters.description: Medium image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

parameters.name: Large
parameters.description: Large image size suitable for the current DPI setting of the display device

returns: Default image size for the current DPI setting of the display device for images that are not based on the SOLIDWORKS icon size setting as defined in swImageSizeToUse_e
remarks:
You can use this method to determine the correct size for:
buttons for your PropertyManager pages.
icons for your macro features.
